typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		ID as string,
		Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> adlsgen2source
adlsgen2source split(isNull("name"),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(withoutnull, withnull)
ConditionalSplit1@withoutnull sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Name as string,
		ID as string,
		Type as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@withnull sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Name as string,
		ID as string,
		Type as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
